title: Gallery of the great. No. 1. Churchill
brief_description: Profile of Winston Spencer Churchill, from his days in the Spanish forces in Cuba; through to war correspondent; Home Secretary; Mayor during the 1914-18 war; Chancellor of the Ex-Checker; and finally a victorious Prime Minister at the end of WWII. Contains archival footage.
